doc.field: - Mark Hammer, a private investor from Melville, N.Y., and members of his family told the Securities and Exchange Commission they have acquired a total of 375,200 shares of Exovir Inc, or 12.9 pct of the total outstanding. Hammer said his group has been accumulating Exovir stock since Oct 28, 1985 for investment purposes and may buy more shares or sell all or part of his current stake. While he said he has no intention of seeking control of the company, Hammer said that because of his "extensive business experience" and his interest in Exovir stock, he may be "invited" to become a member of the company's board.
